Description (EN): Dict containing tags and connectivity strored per element type in a ndarray: element = {"Triangle": np.array([tag_elem, nd1, nd2, nd3 ]), "Quadrangle": np.array([tag_elem, nd1, nd2, nd3, nd4 ])}.
Class description: Define the connectivity with a dict, sorting element by types.

Description (EN): Attribute a group number (int) to each element: group = np.array([tag_elem, group]) . This group number should correspond to a subpart of the machine.
Number of elements per element type and total: nb_elem = {"Total": nb_elem_total (int), "Triangle": nb_elem_triangle (int)  … }.
Define the number of node per element
